title: Reproduce Table 1 from Lakbir et al. (npj Precision Oncology, 2025)
description: Reproduce Table 1 ('Pan-cancer survival landscape of genomic instability measures with respect to disease-free survival') from Lakbir et al., 2025. The task involves preparing the open-access TCGA input data (MAF, CNV segmentation, and clinical files), describing the modeling steps, and providing the extracted table values as a clean CSV.

paper.title: Tumor break load quantitates structural variantâ€“associated genomic instability with biological and clinical relevance across cancers

notes: Raw TCGA files are not included in the repository due to size constraints.
Instead, the input_data directory contains manifests and a download.sh script that fetch open-access TCGA mutation and copy-number data.
The transcribed CSV in extracted_solution/ contains the direct values from Table 1.
